title: Lohan Ratwatte gets new State Ministry
body_lines: MP Lohan Ratwatte has been given another State Ministry in addition to his current position as the State Minister of Gem & Jewellery related Industries.

Accordingly, Ratwatte has been appointed as the new State Minister of Warehouse Facilities, Container Yards, Port Supply Facilities and Boats and Shipping Industry Development by President Gotabaya Rajapaksa.
